item.title: Friggin' stairs. >___<
item.dc:creator: @Setsuna Setsuna
item.description:
@Setsuna wrote:

Okay…Got most of my castle wars stairs up and running but…ONE of these freaking sets WILL NOT WORK. I made a command that teleports me where the stairs should to make sure it’s reachable even…Yeah…Works…But…The stairs refuse to work, no matter what I try…

if (absX == 2425 && absY == 3077) { //lower level heightLevel += 1; teleportToX = 2426; teleportToY = 3074; }

“case 4417” is above that, along with a few more stairs that work with that code. And objectX objectY (Which I tried as well, failed. Took it out, still failed) It’s the highest set of stairs in castle wars…Any help…Please?

Read full topic
